vars.name: people
vars.expr: [{ name = "Alice"; age = 30 }; { name = "Bob"; age = 15 }; { name = "Charlie"; age = 65 }; { name = "Diana"; age = 45 }]

vars.name: adults
vars.expr: [ for person in people do if (person.age) >= 18 then yield { name = person.name; age = person.age; is_senior = (person.age) >= 60 } ]

body.expr: (String.concat " " [string (person.name); string "is"; string (person.age); string (if person.is_senior then " (senior)" else "")])
